q: Nearly three decades later,`` the Donald Rumsfeld problem'' came to the Pentagon with orders from George H. W. Bush to shake the place up.`` Change is hard for people,'' Donald Rumsfeld said. Change is hard. But did you make it harder than it had to be by alienating people? asked David Martin .`` If you don't want to change and someone above you wants to, it's not fun, replied the ex-Secretary of Defense.
